attractions.name: Historic Downtown
attractions.description: Our charming downtown area features unique shops, restaurants, and monthly community events.

attractions.name: Riverwalk Park
attractions.description: A beautiful 3-mile paved trail along the river with picnic areas and scenic views.

attractions.name: Anytown Museum
attractions.description: Learn about our town's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

attractions.name: Mountain Vista
attractions.description: Breathtaking views from this overlook with hiking trails and photo opportunities.

attractions.name: Community Theater
attractions.description: Local productions year-round in our historic 1920s theater building.

attractions.name: Farmers Market
attractions.description: Fresh local produce, crafts, and food every Saturday morning May-October.

attractions.name: Lakefront Recreation Area
attractions.description: Swimming, boating, fishing, and camping facilities at our pristine lake.

attractions.name: Botanical Gardens
attractions.description: 20 acres of themed gardens showcasing native and exotic plant species.
